name: The most annoying, aggravating game ever
name_original: The most annoying, aggravating game ever
description:
It's title is hyped up, but this game is very frustrating. Only 5 obstacles and it still took my friends a while to figure it out. Platforms, minefields, disappearing doors. You'll have fun, but you might be a little irritated after. 

I am not responsible for any broken keyboards. That's all on you.
